resources.string: Connection to API failed. Please check your internet connection.
The timeout of 120 seconds was reached. Probably the answer was very long or the API is overloaded.
The API key you entered is invalid. Go to the settings and check the API Key you provided.
You haven\'t saved any chats yet.\nTouch the Save-Button in a new chat to save.
TTS language not available. Download in settings.
Please scan the QR code for instructions on how to set up and use WristAssist.
Your chat is too long for the AI. Please reset or start a new one.
You exceeded your current quota, please check your plan and billing details.
This model does not exist or you don\'t have access to it.
## See what\'s new \n*The following improvements have been added since the last launch of WristAssist:* \n

### Version 2.5.0 
#### Auto voice input 
Added a setting to automatically open voice input in chats (saves a few clicks) 
#### Custom API server 
Added a setting to choose your private OpenAI-like API server 
#### Changelog 
Added this changelog activity so that you get informed about all upcoming news

### Version 2.4.0 
#### Added Markdown rendering in chats 
The AI models sometimes display text in **bold**, *italics* or <u>underlined</u>. This and other formatting is now displayed correctly. 
#### Added GPT-4 Turbo model 
GPT-4 Turbo is more capable and has knowledge of world events up to April 2023. It is between 2 and 3 times cheaper than GPT-4. 
#### More detailed error messages 
Errors such as too long chats, exceeded quota and invalid models are now displayed correctly. 
#### Several bugfixes
No keyboard with speech recognition installed

### Version 2.6.0 
#### Added watchface complication 
Added a complication for your watchfaces to quickly open the WristAssist input screen. 
#### Scroll to bottom shortcut 
If you click on a saved chat title, it will immediately scroll to bottom. 
#### Vibration on error 
If an error occurs in the chat, you will now feel a different vibration.

### Version 2.6.1 
#### Added more TTS settings 
TTS settings are now in a single list. You can choose between: On, Off, On and auto read and adapted to the input method.

### Version 2.7.0 
#### Added usage activity 
Added activity to check the usage of the individual models. 
#### Instant input 
Added setting to start a new chat immediately. 
#### Several bugfixes
A cute dog with a hat
Shared link will expire in %1$d minutes
The request was rejected. Your prompt may contain text that is not allowed.

### Version 3.0.0 
#### Added image AI (DALL-E) 
You can now use OpenAI's Dall-E to generate, save and share images via a QR code. You can switch between different models, qualities and sizes in the settings. 
#### Several bugfixes and design changes

### Version 3.0.1 
#### Important notice: Changes to your OpenAI API billing 
OpenAI is updating how they bill for your OpenAI API account starting **March 8, 2024**. Instead of receiving a bill at the end of the month, you will need to **pre-purchase credits** to use the API. Just click the okay button to add credits to your account. Otherwise, API requests will temporarily fail for WristAssist until credits are purchased.
### Version 3.0.2 \n#### Several bugfixes and design changes \n

### Version 3.0.3 
#### New GPT-4 Omni model 
OpenAI introduced a new flagship model, that can reason across audio, vision, and text in real time. Support for input method other than text will be available in the future. You can switch to this model, which is only half the price as "GPT-4 Turbo", in the settings.

### Version 3.1.0 
#### Global system prompts 
You can now set a global system role in the settings, that the AI will use in every chat.

### Version 3.1.1 
#### New GPT-4 Omni mini model 
OpenAI released their new model GPT-4o mini, which is their most cost-efficient small model that's smarter and cheaper than GPT-3.5 Turbo, and has vision capabilities. The model has 128K context and an October 2023 knowledge cutoff. You can switch to this model, which is 60% cheaper than GPT-3.5 Turbo, in the settings.
